content: आस्तीक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Relating to, or treating of, the sage आस्तीक. --कः <ab>N.</ab> of an old saint, son of Jaratkāru; (at whose intercession King Janamejaya spared the Nāga Takṣaka from the destruction to which he had doomed the serpent race). <ls>Mb.</ls> gives the following etymology of the name; नाम चास्याभवत्ख्यातं लोकेष्वास्तीक इत्युत . अस्तीत्युक्त्वा गतो यस्मात्पिता गर्भस्थमेव तम् ... --कं A section (पर्व) of the first book of the Mahābhārata.
